entries.meaning: Either of a pair of things related by a correlation; a correlative.

verbs.description: correlate (third-person singular simple present correlates, present participle correlating, simple past and past participle correlated)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To compare things and bring them into a relation having corresponding characteristics.
(intransitive) To be related by a correlation; to be correlated.
examples: Doctrine and worship correlate as theory and practice.
